Subject: Issues installing client
Description:
Our IT team is unable to install EPP on our terminal servers and some laptops despite doing it the same way from an older ticket opened (00417457). 

Some of the terminal servers that EPP was installed on unfortunately are no longer connecting to the console either so we need to go back and fix those servers. 

Our server version is 5.9.4.1 and the systems are Windows Server 2019, windows 10 & 11.

3/19/2025

Joined remote session
- Customer reports that approximately 50 computers are experiencing the issue
- Customer uploaded zap tool and walked her through removing the old EPP client from one server. 
- Customer able to install the EPP client on the server without issue
- Customer will go through the process of removing the EPP client on each of the servers/laptops
- Customer has given verbal agreement that only admin will use the tool
- Sent customer email to confirm with her that she will use the tool only as admin
Next_Steps__c: Waiting for customer's response to follow up email on second attempt
